content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Original Stone Furnace at position(43.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace (position 43.0, -82.0)

### New Stone Furnace at position(45.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace (position 45.0, -82.0)

### Copper Plate Factory
Consists of:
- Burner Mining Drill (position 40.0, -84.0) and Stone Furnace (position 43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Mining Drill (position 40.0, -84.0) and Stone Furnace (position 45.0, -82.0)
- Chest (position 39.5, -85.5) that stores coal

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is not full before attempting to insert items. Check the furnace status and inventory to confirm available space.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check if the tile is already occupied by another entity.

### Errors related to inventory management
- Regularly check your inventory to avoid inserting items into entities that cannot accept them due to full capacity or incorrect item type.
